alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chester; Hardin; Henderson; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Henderson, northeastern McNairy, southern Carroll, northwestern Hardin, eastern Madison and Chester Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blue Goose to near Mifflin to Silerton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Henderson, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Adamsville, Sardis, Reagan, Blue Goose, Mifflin, Bargerton, Wildersville, Morris Chapel, Jacks Creek, Parkers Crossroads, Darden, McNairy, Scotts Hill, Clarksburg, Finger and Milledgeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Chester; Hardin; Henderson; Madison; McNairy
